last_episode_to_air.name: The Ultimate Beastmaster
last_episode_to_air.overview: Of the 54 who dared to stare down the Beast, six remain. Only one will best the competition to claim $50,000 and the "Ultimate Beastmaster" crown

name: Ultimate Beastmaster
overview: In this intense obstacle course series, elite athletes from the U.S. and other countries compete for cash prizes, individual glory and national pride.

seasons.name: No Surrender
seasons.overview: Nine new competitors face a Beast that's fiercer than ever.

episodes.name: Beast Nation
episodes.overview: The first 12 competitors stare down the Beast. The one who racks up the most points will earn $10,000 and a spot in the final round.

episodes.name: Going for Gold
episodes.overview: An Olympic gold medalist dives into the competition, while another contestant literally loses his hair in the blood of the Beast.

episodes.name: The Beast Evolves
episodes.overview: The latest set of contestants tackle an all-new obstacle in Level 1, and those nimble enough to advance to Level 2 face an amped-up Spinal Descent.

episodes.name: The Legend vs. The Beast
episodes.overview: A new twist makes Faceplant even more daunting. One competitor becomes the first ever to finish Level 2. A "Sasuke" champion takes on the Beast.

episodes.name: The Battle of Wills
episodes.overview: One contestant dominates the course through Level 3, but Level 4 still stands in the way of the $10,000 prize.

episodes.name: Beauty Meet the Beast
episodes.overview: An 18-year-old student thinks she has what it takes to go farther than any woman so far. The upgraded Faceplant claims more victims.

episodes.name: Beast Mode
episodes.overview: A competitor raises the bar with a record setting performance, while another soldiers on through arm and leg injuries.

episodes.name: Brother vs. Brother
episodes.overview: A pair of Korean brothers go head-to-head in the belly of the Beast. A crucial mistake could cost one finalist a chance at $10,000.

episodes.name: The Last Call
episodes.overview: In the last qualifying round, the Digestive Track sends competitors plunging into the blood, while another contestant powers through bonus obstacles.

episodes.name: Finale
episodes.overview: In the championship round, tougher obstacles and new point thrusters test the nine winners as they pursue the "Ultimate Beastmaster" title.

episodes.name: The Beast Within
episodes.overview: For the first time, athletes from China, France, India, Italy and Spain join Americans to face off with the Beast for a $10,000 prize.

episodes.name: Out for Blood
episodes.overview: One contestant fights through a hard impact -- and a few stitches -- to get through Level 1. Competitors include a youth leader and a pole dancer.

episodes.name: Taming the Beast
episodes.overview: The Beast swallows up a new crop of athletes that includes an ER doctor, a dance instructor, a pro freerunner and a body shop mechanic.

episodes.name: The Heart of the Beast
episodes.overview: New obstacles in Level 1 test a crop of Beastmaster hopefuls that includes mountaineers, physical therapists, a wrestling coach and an architect.

episodes.name: The Beast Gets Schooled
episodes.overview: Competitors include a tattoo artist from Italy, a noodle bar owner from China, an Indian boxer and an American cheer coach.

episodes.name: The Battle Rages On
episodes.overview: A wrestler, a pole vaulter, a diner owner and an MMA fighter are among those taking on the Beast. A creative strategic move shakes up Level 4.

episodes.name: Scaling the beast
episodes.overview: The Beast takes aim at a couple as a husband and wife from China compete alongside a swimmer, a fashion designer and a church group leader.

episodes.name: Trapping the Beast
episodes.overview: A berth in Level 4 comes down to the wire on Hangman. Athletes include a break dancer, a speed skater, a stunt man and an Air Force medic.

episodes.name: Making the Cut
episodes.overview: Twin brothers from France hope to conquer the Beast, along with a boxer, an engineering student, a bikini fitness model and a motivational speaker.

episodes.name: A beastmaster is Crowned
episodes.overview: The nine winners reconvene for one last run through the Beast with the grand prize of $50,000 and the title of Ultimate Beastmaster on the line.

2.name: No Surrender
2.overview: Nine new competitors face a Beast that's fiercer than ever.

episodes.name: The Beast Evolves
episodes.overview: Nine new competitors face a Beast that's fiercer than ever, but only two will move on to the first semi-final round in Beastmaster history.

episodes.name: Champions Collide
episodes.overview: Two champion climbers are joined by a prizefighter, a powerlifter, a dance instructor, a surfer and others in a battle for two spots in the semi-final.

episodes.name: Strive for Greatness
episodes.overview: A new obstacle called "Rope Burn" challenges the third set of athletes; Two contestants become the last pair to quality for the first semi-final.

episodes.name: Semifinal #1
episodes.overview: Six qualifiers compete for three spots in the championship final, with a new twist that raises the intensity; One athlete hopes a big gamble pays off.

episodes.name: A New Battle Begins
episodes.overview: The Beast evolves again with a new obstacle called "Rib Cage Row," and two of nine contenders will grab the first spots in the second semifinal.

episodes.name: Overcoming the Odds
episodes.overview: The "Crash Pads" return, and a twisty new obstacle greets a group that includes the competition's youngest athlete and a cancer survivor.

episodes.name: For the Glory
episodes.overview: A group that includes a war hero and a survivor of Rwandan genocide confronts the hungry Beast with the last two semifinal berths at stake.

episodes.name: Semifinal #2
episodes.overview: With three spots left in the championship final, the second set of semifinalists faces the brutal task of racing through the entire Beast in one run.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Beastmaster
episodes.overview: Of the 54 who dared to stare down the Beast, six remain. Only one will best the competition to claim $50,000 and the "Ultimate Beastmaster" crown
